title: With more launches, TVS Motor looking to strengthen footprint in premium motorcycle segment
description: Vimal Sumbly, Head Business (Premium), at TVS Motor Company, told ET, the rise in tourism post Covid has spurred demand for premium motorcycles with consumers looking to explore new places with friends, family and a like-minded community. “This is supporting our premiumization drive, both in India and overseas”, he said.
